data.meta_description: One of Stan Marsh's top actors, Gene Hackman - better known as 'Hack Man' - has come a long way since playing Lex Luthor opposite Christopher Reeve in the classic Superman film.
data.text:
About

One of Stan Marsh's top actors, Gene Hackman - better known as 'Hack Man' - has come a long way since playing Lex Luthor opposite Christopher Reeve in the classic Superman film. The good-natured and now retired Hackman initially kept friendly contacts with Reeve until his old co-star began abusing fetuses for their stem cells in a bid to become 'normal'. Hackman become an anti-stem cell activist in a bid to defeat him and ultimately succeeding by sending Reeve to the Phantom Zone. While Hackman passed up Tom Cruise's offer to join in on a crushing lawsuit to destroy South Park, he did stop by to help sacrifice Britney Spears.

Memorable Quotes

"Using stem cells is like playing God. You should leave nature alone." (Krazy Kripples)

"They're affecting your mind, Chris. If you won't stop using stem cells, then we'll stop you!" (Krazy Kripples)

"Now we're going to put you somewhere where you can never touch another fetus again!" (Krazy Kripples)

Featured Episodes
